thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 10 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Castlight Health Reports Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.11

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Castlight Health Reports Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.11
text:
May 10 (Reuters) - Castlight Health Inc:
* CASTLIGHT HEALTH ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.06
* Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.11 * Q1 REVENUE $36.5 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $35.9 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.05 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE ABOUT $0.11 TO $0.15
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $150 MILLION TO $155 MILLION * CASTLIGHT HEALTH - REITERATING OUR 2018 OUTLOOK
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.12, REVENUE VIEW $153.3 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
